au_166733: #!/bin/bash
for folder in "$@"

done

so_66653122: tar cf - directory | gzip -9 > test9

tar cf test9 -I 'gzip -9' directory
``

Explanations about Options.-I:
Filter data through COMMAND. It must accept the -d option, for decompression. The
 argument can contain command line options.
Explanations about Options.-x:
Extract files from an archive. Arguments are optional. When given, they specify
 names of the archive members to be extracted.

Explanations about Options.-l:
Print information about compressed files. No uncompressed output is produced, and
 no files are created or removed. In list mode, the program cannot read the
 compressed data from standard input or from other unseekable sources.
